channel.title: I have 2 questions
channel.description: I'm trying to help someone out with a minigame. Here's my first question 1. How do you make it so that when you kill a certain NPC you get X amount of money added to your inventory, for example, if you kill a demon, how can you make it so 100,000 coins gets added to your inventory 2. How do you make it so that when You kill a certain NPC, you get teleported to a different place

item.title: I have 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I’m trying to help someone out with a minigame. Here’s my first question

  1. How do you make it so that when you kill a certain NPC you get X amount of money added to your inventory, for example, if you kill a demon, how can you make it so 100,000 coins gets added to your inventory
  2. How do you make it so that when You kill a certain NPC, you get teleported to a different place

Read full topic
